solution.text:
The volume of the tank \(= _{{2*j}}_ cm \times _{{2*k}}_ cm \times _{{2*l}}_ cm \)= _{{j*k*l*8}}_
Rate of flow into the tank = 8L/minute = 8000\(cm^3\)/minute
Therefore, time taken to fill tank completely \(= \frac {_{{j*k*l*8}}_}{8000} \)= _{{j*k*l*Decimal('0.001')}}_ minutes

content.text: Water is pouring into a cuboidal tank of length _{{2*j}}_ cm, breadth _{{2*k}}_ cm and height _{{2*l}}_ cm at the rate of 8L/minute. How many minutes will it take to fill the tank completely?
